headline: Fox's Rocky Horror Picture Show Casts Victoria Justice as Janet
content: Join or Sign InSign in to customize your TV listingsBy joining TV Guide, you agree to our Terms of Use and acknowledge the data practices in our Privacy Policy.See who will play Brad, Riff Raff and RockyFox's Rocky Horror Picture Showhas found its Janet and Brad. On Monday, the network announced it has cast Victoria Justice and Ryan McCarten as the sweethearts who stumble upon Dr. Frank-N-Furter's home after their car breaks down.Justice and McCarten are both known for their roles in recent children's sitcoms. Justice starred on Nickelodeon's Victorious until 2013 and McCarten currently appears on Disney's Liv & Maddie. Susan Sarandon and Barry Bostwick originated the roles of Janet and Brad.Fox's two-hour reimagining of Rocky Horror will also starOrange Is the New Black's Laverne Cox as Frank-N-Furter, an alien mad scientist who is celebrating the birth of Rocky (Staz Nair), an attractive man created to fulfill Frank's desires. Penny Dreadful's Reeve Carney will play Riff Raff, one of Frank's loyal servants.The Rocky Horror Show will film this winter and air in the fall.
